text: "Don't Forget to Remember Me" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her debut studio album, Some Hearts (2005). ==Music video== The music video for "Don't Forget to Remember Me" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on March 16, 2006. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of April 27, 2006. On July 27, 2006, the music video for "Don't Forget to Remember Me" took the top spot of CMT's Top 20 Countdown, where it remained for two weeks. ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Don't Forget to Remember Me
